revised_title: Edward Crisp Bullard: A Pioneering Geophysicist
tldr: The article is a biography of Edward Crisp Bullard, a renowned British geophysicist who made significant contributions to the field of Earth sciences in the 20th century. Born into a prosperous brewing family, Bullard faced challenges in his early life but eventually found his passion for geophysics. He conducted groundbreaking research and inspired many colleagues and students throughout his career.
